wordpressPost.title: Heaven is full fool
wordpressPost.content:
So it has come to my attention today that heaven, known as Low Earth Orbit to normal people, has officially reached critical mass and we are in trouble if nothing is done about it.

In other news, just because I'm pro linux, here is a lovely explanation as to why exactly it is a lot better.
